i'm not quite sure at what point i would have realized how comfortable, safe and routine my life has become if it weren't for facebook updates. every day we read about people we're friends with.. or "friends" with and all that they're doing. something as simple as what theyre doing for the day, what theyre doing in weeks, marriage, and deaths. its crazy how one minute i'll be okay. i log on to facebook. scroll down a couple lines and then feel completely and utterly disgusted with myself and all that i havent accomplished. i keep telling myself that i have one year to work and then its grad school. i find out a friend is now currently enrolled and i havent even picked up a paint brush since may. i feel guilty sure, and there are days i want to paint however i havent. even my own mother said 'i know you and if you wanted to paint you would find a way and you havent yet' 
what is it that we somehow lose that high we used to get from the things we used to love doing?
i know i dont want to work retail for the rest of my life. that much im sure of. i dont know if i can have painting for a income.. or my main source of income is what i should specify. im not sure if i want it as my main source to begin with.
i cant even count how many hours ive spent complaining or venting to my boyfriend about what to do, what i can do and how to do it or where to go. he tells me all the things i know and yet i still do nothing. even now im laying here with my heart pounding out of my chest because i dont know where the time has gone since may and i have nothing to show for myself. a year is going to fly by and all ive done is take it day by day. worrying about what bill to pay what i can save and what can i buy with my next paycheck just for momentary happiness. yes im a consumer whore- im fine with the fact that i like to have nice things. i just wish i had spent all that time online window shopping for grad schools or ideas for projects rather than items to potentially buy.

not quite sure where i was going with this. but i do need to make some ground rules for myself and i figure if i write it down then i cant go back on it or push it to a further due date.

so i spent a the past weekend in montreal, canada with the ballet crew and a couple other cool guys. 


*im warning you now if you dont feel like reading a long ramble of my trip then dont.. this is for my own recording cause i want to remember my first time out of the country and my first trip without the rents.. so go roll ya eyes somewhere else.


it all began friday night right after the first pas de deux class.. which was hell. then packed up two cars of luggage and 8 bodies in two cars. 6 hours later filled with coffee, havana nights soundtrack, deer and fog we finally made it to canada. we crashed that night cause it was def 3 in the am. 

the next day, we scoped out the scenes and went shopping on st. catherine's st. best strawberries and cream crepes ever! then later that day we went to the hard rock cafe for dinnah.. mmm sangria. sooo delicious. before we crashed early that night instead of hittin up the club we went to some crappy strip club.. considering it was my first time going to one.. i still think i could do a better job. def ask me to do my imitation of sexy chanel.. after doing her crap routine and us makin fun a bit for something being stuck up her butt she came over and introduced herself.. "hi where are you guys from?" everyone looks at me. . "im from massachusetts and the rest are from rhode island" (shes shaking our hands) "thats cool.. you know i do girls on girls, boys and girls and boys and boys you know.. dont be shy.." everyone uncomfortably laughs.. ewwww. i almost wanted to throw up my 9 dollar beer. but i figured id keep it down for the sake of spending 9 bucks plus tip. but it was good for a laugh needless to say. so at this point im pretty much sober yet manage to walk right into a trash can.. and continue to trip over it. my excuse is that i was looking behind me talking to john so i didnt see it. so a whole group of gorgeous boys were standing off to the side and saw the whole thing. everyones cracking up including myself and someone yelled out that i had too much to drink which caused everyone i was with to laugh harder cause they knew i didnt drink enough and was sober. it was pretty funny. and it def lost something while typing it.

then that sunday we engorged ourselves with the best breakfast ever. seriously we didnt eat until 6 hours later that day. mmm crepes, omelets, waffles and the best coffee ever. it was better than any sex ive ever had. s e r i o u s l y.

later on sunday after star bucks liz, holly, joe, shane, fusco and fuscos brother went to the casino and old montreal with nothing there apparently while me and amanda went shopping again.. got the coolest shirts from french connection.. one shirt that says "hot as fcuk" and "best fcuk there is".. then a skull and cross bones shirt that says "im a pretty poison" from buffalo. just one more shirt for my growing collection. ooh then went to la senza (apparently canadians dont have a victorias secret.. they have la senza instead) so i got some good deals and bought some pretty bras and a couple tanks.. i sorta felt like i was betraying v.s. but pretty lingerie for cheap is just clutch. im so proud of me and amanda though.. we went the whole day by ourselves without getting lost. yay us!

made a friend with the pool boy called vladamir.. hahaha. i just liked saying his name.. and he just liked my skull and cross bones sweat pant capris. and that i didnt pronounce my r's.. and i didnt want his cookies unlike amanda.

after dinnah at some steak house and several long islands we went out scouting for clubs.. we eventually went to one that was empty. so it was pretty cool we had our own private club for a bit. but that got old so we went down to peel pub and got smashed. the waiter recognized the crew from earlier and gave us free shots.. i stunned john for tellin secrets to josh.. and somehow he stunned me back and we ended up on the floor. for whatever reason in all the pictures taken at the bar im stickin my tongue out .. and walking back i held hands with john.. eh? and amanda blew raspberries to herself cause she couldnt feel her lips and wanted everyone to do it too. or so im told. we got the boys to pose in front of the church to imitate pachel bell (spelling?). . .very cool. and then 6 long islands, two shots of vodka, sangria, wine and a couple breezers in my system i managed to rip my jeans right on the crotch while jeteing with the girls down the hotels hall then we got yelled at by the manager. whoops. 

went to bed round 4ish.. the tv there after hours is nuts.. talk about soft porn.

woke up and drove back home.. we stopped in vermont to get some grub.. and there was def a cockroach. the lady yelled at us cause we "partied all weekend and dont know what we ordered" even though they goofed up the orders.. and they got double pissed when shane turned around and yelled out the quote of hte weekend "its quite fancy here isnt it?" and then we later told the old bitch manager about the bug on the floor she kicked it and told us it was a bumble bee..amanda "thats disgusting" me: "but the "bumble" bee doesnt have yellow stripes." then the old bat of a manager told amanda to pick it up if she didnt like it. hahahahaha. so we left and grabbed some wendys instead.. at least they dont leave their dead roaches in the doorway. 

but overall i had such a good time and i def want to go again.. maybe not montreal cause its wicked touristy.. but canada is so beautiful im thinking on living there when i get older. all i can think of is a cleaner and more beautiful new york.. and the people are nicer. thats a plus.


mmm thats about it for canada.. pictures will follow cause there were def some good ones.

aight sorry for it being so long. but deal.


-me
